ModelLayer.FileLoaders

Class ImageFileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ModelLayer.FileLoaders.ImageFileLoader

  • public class ImageFileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads in files as Images.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.awt.Image _Cache_Crashed_Car
      Used as a cache: This prevents reading the same crash image file from disk twice for both cars.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • LoadBackgroundImage

        public static java.awt.Image LoadBackgroundImage()
        Loads the background image for the main menu. Returns null in case of error.
        Returns:
        The background image for the main menu. Also could be used on tha launch screen.

      • LoadKeyboardLayoutImage

        public static java.awt.Image LoadKeyboardLayoutImage(int PlayerNumber)
        Return the image file containing the keyboard layout for a given player. E.g.: Player1: arrows, Player2: W-A-S-D
        Parameters:
        PlayerNumber - Either 1 or 2. (It is not an index number)
        Returns:
        Returns the image representing the control keys.

      • LoadMapSelectionImage

        public static java.awt.Image LoadMapSelectionImage(java.lang.String mapName)
        Loads the maps thumbnails. Used on the Launch Screen when user selects map.
        Parameters:
        mapName - The name of the map must be match with an element of the SharedResources.MSP_Maps array to be consistent with the file name on disk.
        Returns:
        Returns the image representing the thumbnail view of a selectable map.

      • LoadCarImageFromFileForLaunchScreen

        public static java.awt.Image LoadCarImageFromFileForLaunchScreen(int carId)
        Loads the thumbnail of a car. Used on the Launch Screen when user selects a car. *
        Parameters:
        carId - An index number starting from 0. This is used as a filename prefix.
        Returns:
        Returns the thumbnail image of the requested car.

      • LoadSelectorArrowImage

        public static java.awt.Image LoadSelectorArrowImage(boolean LeftToRightFacing)
        Loads the arrow icon used in the LaunchScreen when selecting car or map.
        Parameters:
        LeftToRightFacing - True to load the arrow facing from left to right. False for the opposite direction.
        Returns:
        Returns the image of the arrow icon with the selected direction.

      • ImgFileRead

        public static java.awt.Image ImgFileRead(java.lang.String fileNameWithPath)
        Reads a file as an image using the provided file path in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        fileNameWithPath - The path of the file to read.
        Returns:
        Returns the file as an Image or returns null if the operation was unsuccessful.

      • LoadCarImages

        public static java.awt.Image[] LoadCarImages(int carImageIndex)
        Loads the car images in all its angles for in-game display.
        Parameters:
        carImageIndex - The index number of the selected car. Starts from 0.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of Images with all the angles represented in the SharedResources.CAR_ImageFile_Angles array

      • LoadCrashedCarImage

        public static java.awt.Image LoadCrashedCarImage()
        Returns the image of the crashed car. Used in-game when two car crashes to each other.
        Returns:
        The image of the crashed car.
